chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My iPhone 12 Pro has the above problem:

I chose the iPhone 12 Pro in very good condition. Unfortunately, I was very disappointed when I unpacked it.
The screen on the right shows a long scratch.
The edges are also not as good as they should be. The speaker is dirty. The silent button is also dirty. The edges of the display to the hardcase are worn out. This does not match the very good condition for this price!

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The Customer wants a refund.

Regards,
Sila from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
